verses.verse: ה֥וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Ho Woe אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz to the land צִלְצַ֣ל <S%H6767><s%> tzil-Tzal shadowing כְּנָפָ֑יִם <S%H3671><s%> ke-na-Fa-yim; with wings אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Which מֵעֵ֖בֶר <S%H5676><s%> me-'E-ver which [is] beyond לְנַֽהֲרֵי־ <S%H5104><s%> le-na-ha-rei- the rivers כֽוּשׁ׃ <S%H3568><s%> Chush. of Ethiopia

הַשֹּׁלֵ֨חַ <S%H7971><s%> hash-sho-Le-ach That sendeth בַּיָּ֜ם <S%H3220><s%> bai-Yam by the sea צִירִ֗ים <S%H6735><s%> tzi-Rim, ambassadors וּבִכְלֵי־ <S%H3627><s%> u-vich-lei- even in vessels גֹמֶא֮ <S%H1573><s%> go-Me of bulrushes עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> pe-nei- upon מַיִם֒ <S%H4325><s%> ma-Yim the waters לְכ֣וּ׀ <S%H1980><s%> le-Chu Go מַלְאָכִ֣ים <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim messengers קַלִּ֗ים <S%H7031><s%> kal-Lim, ye swift אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to גּוֹי֙ <S%H1471><s%> goy to a nation מְמֻשָּׁ֣ךְ <S%H4900><s%> me-mush-Shach scattered וּמוֹרָ֔ט <S%H4178><s%> u-mo-Rat, and peeled אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am to a people נוֹרָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> no-Ra terrible מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he וָהָ֑לְאָה <S%H1973><s%> va-Hal-'ah; from their beginning hitherto גּ֚וֹי <S%H1471><s%> Goy a nation קַו־ <S%H99999><s%> kav- קָ֣ו <S%H6978><s%> kav meted out וּמְבוּסָ֔ה <S%H4001><s%> u-me-vu-Sah, and trodden down אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- Whose בָּזְא֥וּ <S%H958><s%> ba-ze-'U have spoiled נְהָרִ֖ים <S%H5104><s%> ne-ha-Rim the rivers אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> ar-Tzo. whose land

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei All ye inhabitants תֵבֵ֖ל <S%H8398><s%> te-Vel of the world וְשֹׁ֣כְנֵי <S%H7931><s%> ve-Sho-che-nei and dwellers אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz; on the earth כִּנְשֹׂא־ <S%H5375><s%> kin-so- ye when he lifteth up נֵ֤ס <S%H5251><s%> nes an ensign הָרִים֙ <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim on the mountains תִּרְא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> tir-'U, see וְכִתְקֹ֥עַ <S%H8628><s%> ve-chit-Ko-a' and when he bloweth שׁוֹפָ֖ר <S%H7782><s%> sho-Far a trumpet תִּשְׁמָֽעוּ׃ <S%H8085><s%> tish-Ma-'u. hear ס sa-Mek

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki For כֹ֨ה <S%H3541><s%> choh For so אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, about; אֶשְׁקֹוטָה 'esh-ko-tah כאֶשְׁקֳטָ֖ה <S%H8252><s%> 'esh-ko-Tah appease קוְאַבִּ֣יטָה <S%H5027><s%> ve-'ab-Bi-tah and I will consider בִמְכוֹנִ֑י <S%H4349><s%> vim-cho-Ni; in my dwelling place כְּחֹ֥ם <S%H2527><s%> ke-Chom heat צַח֙ <S%H6703><s%> tzach like a clear עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei- and א֔וֹר <S%H219><s%> or, sunshine כְּעָ֥ב <S%H5645><s%> ke-'Av [and] like a cloud טַ֖ל <S%H2919><s%> tal of dew בְּחֹ֥ם <S%H2527><s%> be-Chom in the heat קָצִֽיר׃ <S%H7105><s%> ka-Tzir. of harvest

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei For afore קָצִיר֙ <S%H7105><s%> ka-Tzir the harvest כְּתָם־ <S%H8552><s%> ke-tom- is perfect פֶּ֔רַח <S%H6525><s%> Pe-rach, when the bud וּבֹ֥סֶר <S%H1155><s%> u-Vo-ser and the sour grape גֹּמֵ֖ל <S%H1580><s%> go-Mel is ripening יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh becomes נִצָּ֑ה <S%H5328><s%> nitz-Tzah; in the flower וְכָרַ֤ת <S%H3772><s%> ve-cha-Rat he shall both cut off הַזַּלְזַלִּים֙ <S%H2150><s%> haz-zal-zal-Lim the sprigs בַּמַּזְמֵר֔וֹת <S%H4211><s%> bam-maz-me-Rot, with pruning hooks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַנְּטִישׁ֖וֹת <S%H5189><s%> han-ne-ti-Shot the branches הֵסִ֥יר <S%H5493><s%> he-Sir and take away הֵתַֽז׃ <S%H8456><s%> he-Taz. [and] cut down

יֵעָזְב֤וּ <S%H5800><s%> ye-'a-ze-Vu They shall be left יַחְדָּו֙ <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav together לְעֵ֣יט <S%H5861><s%> le-'Eit unto the fowls הָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim, of the mountains וּֽלְבֶהֱמַ֖ת <S%H929><s%> u-le-ve-he-Mat and to the beasts הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; of the earth וְקָ֤ץ <S%H6972><s%> ve-Katz shall summer עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav of הָעַ֔יִט <S%H5861><s%> ha-'A-yit, and the fowls וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all בֶּהֱמַ֥ת <S%H929><s%> be-he-Mat upon them and all the beasts הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the earth עָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and תֶּחֱרָֽף׃ <S%H2778><s%> te-che-Raf. shall winter

בָּעֵת֩ <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et In that time הַהִ֨יא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi he יֽוּבַל־ <S%H2986><s%> yu-val- be brought שַׁ֜י <S%H7862><s%> shai shall the present לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot, of hosts עַ֚ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am of a people מְמֻשָּׁ֣ךְ <S%H4900><s%> me-mush-Shach scattered וּמוֹרָ֔ט <S%H4178><s%> u-mo-Rat, and peeled וּמֵעַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> u-me-'Am and from a people נוֹרָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> no-Ra terrible מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he וָהָ֑לְאָה <S%H1973><s%> va-Hal-'ah; from their beginning hitherto גּ֣וֹי׀ <S%H1471><s%> Goy a nation קַו־ kav- קָ֣ו <S%H6978><s%> kav meted out וּמְבוּסָ֗ה <S%H4001><s%> u-me-vu-Sah, and trodden under foot אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Whose בָּזְא֤וּ <S%H958><s%> ba-ze-'U have spoiled נְהָרִים֙ <S%H5104><s%> ne-ha-Rim the rivers אַרְצ֔וֹ <S%H776><s%> ar-Tzo, whose land אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מְק֛וֹם <S%H4725><s%> me-Kom to the place שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> shem- of the name יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- the mount צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon. Zion ס sa-Mek
